name: SnowflakeDB - Long Queries in Small/X-Small warehouses
programText:
F = data('snowflake.total_elapsed_time.avg', filter=filter('WAREHOUSE_SIZE', 'Small', 'X-Small'), extrapolation='last_value').mean(by=['DATABASE_NAME', 'SCHEMA_NAME', 'QUERY_TYPE', 'WAREHOUSE_SIZE', 'USER_NAME']).mean(over='1h').publish(label='F')
detect(when(F > threshold(600000))).publish('SnowflakeDB - Long Queries in Small/X-Small warehouses')

rules.description: The value of Long Running Queries in Small or X-Small warehouse is above 600000.
rules.detectLabel: SnowflakeDB - Long Queries in Small/X-Small warehouses

publishLabelOptions.displayName: Long Running Queries in Small or X-Small warehouse
publishLabelOptions.label: F
